uae.description: All product information must be provided in both Arabic and English languages
uae.cost_impact: Medium - requires redesign of packaging with translation services
uae.timeline: 4-6 weeks for translation and design approval

uae.description: Nutritional information must be displayed per 100g of product in table format
uae.cost_impact: Low - requires laboratory analysis and label update

uae.description: Allergens must be highlighted in red text within the ingredients list
Products requiring Halal certification must display the appropriate logo
uae.priority: Critical for meat/animal products, Recommended for others
uae.cost_impact: Low - design addition once certification obtained

uae.description: Production and expiry dates must be in day/month/year format and printed directly on packaging
uae.cost_impact: Medium - may require printing process adjustments

uk.description: Allergens must be listed in a separate box or highlighted in the ingredients list
Products must be labeled with metric measurements (e.g., 200g not 7.05oz)
UK Conformity Assessed mark replacing CE marking for certain product categories
Color-coded nutritional information (red, amber, green) for key nutrients
uk.regulation: UK Food Standards Agency voluntary scheme (but preferred by retailers)
uk.cost_impact: Medium - requires design adjustment and potentially reformulation

uk.description: Packaging must include information about recyclability and disposal

requirements.regulations: EU Regulation 10/2011, UK Materials and Articles in Contact with Food Regulations
EU Regulation 1935/2004, UK Materials and Articles in Contact with Food Regulations
requirements.considerations: FSC certification preferred by many retailers

requirements.regulations: EU Regulation 1935/2004, UK Materials and Articles in Contact with Food Regulations

requirements.considerations: Recycled content requirements in some markets

shelf_life.description: Products must have minimum shelf life remaining upon arrival in market
shelf_life.impact: Critical for product acceptance by distributors/retailers

shelf_life.description: Required storage temperature/conditions must be clearly stated
shelf_life.uae_requirement: Arabic and English, with temperature range

shelf_life.description: Different terminology for shelf life depending on product safety risk
shelf_life.uk_requirement: Use-by for perishable foods, Best-before for others
